definition[0]: when you end your relationship or connection with another person, organization, country etc, especially because of a disagreement
example[0]: the severance of diplomatic ties between the two countries
definition[1]: the act of officially ending an agreement or contract, especially between an employer and an employee
example[1]: Before signing, it is important to know whether severance is available.
example[2]: The company hasnâ€™t yet negotiated severance payments for the 70 employees affected by the closure.
